RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 33. Maiden Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NO MAS CERVEZA slow early to be the distant trailer, angled six wide at the top of the lane while finding his best stride and closed with a rush to be up in time. LEWIS AND CLARK stalked the pace down the backside, split rivals under a steady drive at the quarter pole to engage the leader from three wide, lugged in briefly down the lane, straightened out and finished willingly. R CLIFFHANGER set the pace under pressure early, opened a clear lead in the turn, responded down the lane while drifting out in mid-stretch and was caught in the final hundred yards in a game effort. PAYMASTER GENERAL crowded at the start, raced up to contend on the backstretch, was called upon in the turn to be prominent and failed to sustain his rally in the lane. CAN'T CRASHMYPARTY went evenly posing no threat. FORMYBOYS showed brief speed to press the pace and came up empty on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: No Mas Cerveza
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, angled 6 wide, best stride late, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Lewis and Clark
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, split rivals, lugged in, willingly, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Paymaster General
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W
ENTRY.COMMENT: crowded start, early bid, failed to sustain

ENTRY.NAME: R Cliffhanger
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, cleared, responded, caught late, gamely

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 96. Starter Allowance Purse 17600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 13 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ELLE'SBIGSEACRET stalked the dueling pacesetters into the turn, circled three wide to take command straightening out for home and drew off in the lane convincingly. CHACO SPIRIT slow early to be well off the leaders, rallied turning for home and closed well to be up for the place. LIMIT UP set a pressured pace from the fence, responded when called upon, was no match for the winner and kept-on well through the stretch only to be caught late for the place. THE COOKIE MAN pressed the pace fo the head of the stretch and flattened out in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Limit Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, kept on, lost place

ENTRY.NAME: Elle'sbigseacret
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, circled 3 wide, took command, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Chaco Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, patient handling, late gain, up for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHEWEARSMYRING reserved off the pace down the backside, made a steady advance along the rail on the far turn, cut the corner and finished well up the fence to take command late. ISLANDINTHESTREAM set a pressured pace for three-quarters, shook clear turning for home, finished willingly and was caught in deep stretch in a game effort. ECHOLITE tracked the pace while well placed three wide, threatened turning for home and lacked a strong enough late response. TRAMA QUEEN stalked the leaders from three wide through the final bend and finished evenly failing to gain ground in the stretch. LADY CAIRO pressed the pace to the quarter pole and weakened in the lane. WAR VOW raced wide in the first turn, settled near the rear of the field down the backside, rallied into the far turn and flattened out in upper stretch. ZIPSY ROSE LEE was one-paced never offering a threat. QUICKSTYLE trailed most of the way. BROADWAY CHARM steadily faded to the rear of the field.

ENTRY.NAME: Islandinthestream
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, shook clear, willingly, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Echolite
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, well placed, no late bid, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Shewearsmyring
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, steady advance, cut corner, closed well inside

ENTRY.NAME: War Vow
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide 1st turn, brief rally, flattened out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 73. Allowance Purse 36200. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 13 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowa nces).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CASUAL ATTIRE stalked the pace from the fence down the backside, cut the corner when the pacesetting stablemate drifted off the fence turning for home, took command in upper stretch and cleared off down the lane. TEAM LEYENDECKER prompted the pace from two wide to the quarter pole, overtook the pacesetter turning for home, was carried out to the four path and could not go with the rail skimming winner. KNOCK WOOD reserved off the pace to the far turn and made a steady grinding advance coming home. HIDDEN ACCESS set the pace to the far turn on a clear lead, responded to go with the challenger at the quarter pole, drifted off the fence turning for home opening the rail for the winner and weakened down the lane. VENTURE ON well placed for the first half mile and faded coming home. MONSTER HUNTER trailed most of the way as a non-threat. MARVIN'S EXPRESS failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Hidden Access
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and Ella D Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead, drifted out, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Team Leyendecker
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 2 wide, bid, not enough, 2d best

ENTRY.NAME: Casual Attire
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace inside, cut corner, cleared off

ENTRY.NAME: Marvin's Express
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer and Beckett Racing Team LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 13 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LIGHT UP MY LIFE set a pressured pace while racing three wide, shook off the pressers in upper stretch and drew clear in the lane. FALL CAMPAIGN reserved off the pace in mid-pack, circled six wide turning for home and closed well down the stretch to gain the place. JUMP INTO SANITY settled off the leaders down the backside, rallied five wide in the turn to be prominent at the head of the lane and kept-on willingly. DULCE VICTORIA pressed the pace from the inside through the turn and weakened late in the drive. IRON BERTIE tracked the leaders from the fence to the bend, dropped back on the turn and finished evenly. BIG BANG BLUE trailed to the quarter pole and passed weaker rivals in the lane. LORI'S EYES went evenly failing to menace. MOON PARTY broke wide leaving the gate, continued to be wide down the backside and lacked a response when called upon. VAVITE was one-paced failing to threaten. CREATIVE CADENCE stalked the leaders from four wide through the turn and gave way in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Iron Bertie
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, dropped back, finished evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bang Blue
ENTRY.OWNER: Burnsworth Richard Buyea Kristina and Navy Chief's Racing Stable

ENTRY.NAME: Light Up My Life
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, shook free, drew off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 84. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 13 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CORNER KICK hustled early to gain position down the backside, rallied four wide in the turn to engage the leader in upper stretch, dueled down the lane and prevailed in deep stretch. LADY LOTTIE set a pressured pace from the fence, responded when challenged at the head of the lane to battle down the stretch and was out-finished in the closing strides. FOREST B pressed the pace from between rivals to the head of the lane and finished evenly as no match for the top pair. OAXACA rated in mid-pack well ahead of the second flight and mounted a mild bid down the lane. GO STELLAIRE failed to menace. CAUSE OF LOVE was never a threat. FABULOUS CLOWN trailed most of the way as a non-factor. SHEZ SHACKED UP pressed the pace from three wide and gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Clown
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Forest B
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, between rivals, even late

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Lottie
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, responded, dug-in, outfinished, 2d best

ENTRY.NAME: Corner Kick
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, steady advance, bid 4 wide, dueled, prevailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 86. Allowance Purse 25900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR OHIO BRED OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 125 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 13 Allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZAKARIA sped off to a clear lead shortly away from the gate, maintained the advantage to the head of the lane, responded when called upon and was never threatened. OKLAHOMA JOE stalked the pacesetter through the turn, was always well placed in striking distance and failed to gain on the winner. MALIBU CLASSIC tracked the leaders from between rivals in the turn, made a mild rally to the top of the lane and finished evenly. EXCITEMENT reserved off the pace to the turn, made a four wide bid to the head of the stretch, angled in down the lane and lacked a closing response. EL ROSILLO passed weaker rivals in the lane while mounting a mild rally. HOPPY GILMORE contended early and flattened out turning for home. EL MARRO was never a factor. WILLIE WANDO steadily dropped back.

ENTRY.NAME: Oklahoma Joe
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, well placed, failed to gain

ENTRY.NAME: Excitement
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, bid 4w, angled in, lacked closing response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 30. Maiden Special Weight Purse 31800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COMMISSIONER D reserved off the pace along the rail, saved ground through the turn, waited briefly at the quarter pole for racing room, split rivals turning for home, angled wide in upper stretch and closed with a rush to be going away at the wire. HISTORYINTHEMAKING prompted the pace from two wide to upper stretch, briefly took command down the lane but could not hold off the fast charging winner. MY DANIELA well placed tracking the leader from three wide, rallied to threaten in mid-stretch and was outkicked to the wire. B SASSI settled off the pace for the first quarter, rallied five wide to loom boldly turning for home and failed to sustain his bid. WINGS OF HEAVEN set a pressured pace throughout, battled down the lane and weakened late in the drive while in close quarters along the rail. COWGIRLS HUMOR passed tiring rivals in the stretch. HOT PRINCESS showed speed for three-eighths and faded. LATE BLOOMBOPPER trailed most of the way as a non-factor. BOLD RUBY contended for a half mile and stopped in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Commissioner D
ENTRY.OWNER: HMD Racing Stables LLC and Taste of Victory Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, saved ground, waited, angled out, closed w/rush

ENTRY.NAME: Late Bloombopper
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W

ENTRY.NAME: Wings of Heaven
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, battled, weakened late, in tight

ENTRY.NAME: Historyinthemaking
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, led late, couldn't hold

ENTRY.NAME: B Sassi
ENTRY.OWNER: Gregg Hoover LLC and H5 Racing LLC
